content: --यात्रा {1} worldly affairs, the course of worldly life, business of the world; एवं किलेयं लोकयात्रा <ls>Mv. 7</ls>; यावदयं संसारस्तावत्प्रसिद्धैवेयं लोकयात्रा <ls>Ve. 3.</ls> {2} a popular usage or custom. {3} worldly existence, career in life; <ls>Māl. 4</ls>, <ls n="Māl.">6.</ls> {4} support of life, maintenance.
